{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3410183,"name":"nitai haflon","username":"nitai","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/bbce88/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-07-22T13:29:39.793Z","cooked":"

Hey,
In recent discussion my team has started to think about if it’s “ethical” to request a certain team to not choose your team in the alliance selection ceremony because you wants to be chosen by another team that is ranked lower.
Do y’all think it’s ok to ask for something like that or not?

  • Yes
  • No
0 voters

Anand","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/yanand2025/{size}/234117_2.png","title":null}]},"chart_type":"bar","title":null}]},{"id":3410188,"name":"JoshuaPohlman","username":"shuki","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/f14d63/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-07-22T13:44:11.904Z","cooked":"

Sure you can ask them to but expect them to pick you anyways so you can either say yes or burn yourself. Assuming they would want to pick you it would be a win win for them. Either you say yes and their happy or you say no and dont get to be picked.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2024-07-22T13:44:11.904Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":288,"readers_count":287,"score":242.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":468969,"topic_slug":"alliance-selection","display_username":"JoshuaPohlman","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":12}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":30457,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"9496 | Design Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/alliance-selection/468969/2","custom_user_title":"9496 | Design Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":8},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":12,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3410190,"name":"","username":"pigrammer","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/pigrammer/{size}/234083_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-22T13:48:01.402Z","cooked":"

It’s ethical to ask for anything - it’s not ethical to demand it or not cooperate because of it. If said captain thinks you’re their best chance they will pick you and you can either accept or decline, but should you accept you should not protest or not try your hardest.

Note that ethical and Graciously Professional are not the same. Asking someone not to pick you because you want to be picked by someone else is not GP, but it is ethical. (If they ask you if you would accept, feel free to say no; they asked. However, going up to a team and saying you don’t want to play with them feels rude to me).

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2024-07-22T13:49:50.667Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":275,"readers_count":274,"score":115.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":468969,"topic_slug":"alliance-selection","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64857,"hidden":false,"trust_level":3,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"246 Software Lead"},"post_url":"/t/alliance-selection/468969/3","custom_user_title":"246 Software Lead","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3410191,"name":"Skye Leake","username":"Skyehawk","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/skyehawk/{size}/179363_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-22T13:48:17.189Z","cooked":"

Is it the off season and you really want to play with a different team? Absolutely ok in my mind.

In season is a bit more tricky. But the “would you say yes if we picked you?” Conversation is absolutely ok imo.

Broad strokes you need to be honest/ direct about your reasoning.

All of this is assuming match play is above board and no one is sandbagging.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2024-07-22T13:49:09.973Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":261,"readers_count":260,"score":127.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":468969,"topic_slug":"alliance-selection","display_username":"Skye Leake","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":true,"admin":false,"staff":true,"user_id":19235,"hidden":false,"trust_level":4,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Pretengineer"},"post_url":"/t/alliance-selection/468969/4","custom_user_title":"Pretengineer","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":5}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3410194,"name":"","username":"Clodsire","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/clodsire/{size}/266066_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-22T13:57:53.641Z","cooked":"

I think it’s perfectly fine to ask. But at the same time the captain has no obligation to listen to your request.

shuki:

Sure you can ask them to but expect them to pick you anyways so you can either say yes or burn yourself. Assuming they would want to pick you it would be a win win for them. Either you say yes and their happy or you say no and dont get to be picked.

This brings up another question. Is it GP or ethical to invite a team you know will say no to prevent them from being picked by another team?

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2024-07-22T23:00:38.652Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":164,"readers_count":163,"score":67.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":468969,"topic_slug":"alliance-selection","display_username":"John V","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32591,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/alliance-selection/468969/6","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"thinking","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3410398,"name":"Brandon King","username":"kingbrandon14","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kingbrandon14/{size}/261181_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-22T23:15:02.316Z","cooked":"

Yes 100%, IMO thats part of the fun strategy that goes into alliance selection. If you’re a team in that situation, I see no reason not to try to give your alliance the biggest possible advantage going into playoffs. You earned the right to scorch by seeding high.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2024-07-22T23:15:02.316Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":148,"readers_count":147,"score":234.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":468969,"topic_slug":"alliance-selection","display_username":"Brandon King","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":32591,"username":"JohnV","name":"John V","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/johnv/{size}/218336_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":13}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":19708,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2910 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/alliance-selection/468969/7","custom_user_title":"2910 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":8},{"id":"100","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":13,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3410402,"name":"Brandon King","username":"kingbrandon14","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kingbrandon14/{size}/261181_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-22T23:46:48.783Z","cooked":"

This is actually how 1678 won their first ever championship division back in 2013. They were declined by 4 other top-8 teams before they finally selected 148, who accepted from the 16th seed.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2024-07-22T23:46:48.783Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":137,"readers_count":136,"score":72.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":468969,"topic_slug":"alliance-selection","display_username":"Brandon King","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K9CdUuwzAC0","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":2}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":19708,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2910 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/alliance-selection/468969/8","custom_user_title":"2910 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"open_mouth","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3410403,"name":"Andrew Lawrence","username":"Andrew_L","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/andrew_l/{size}/270442_2.png","created_at":"2024-07-22T23:50:41.169Z","cooked":"

It is unethical to get mad at a team for picking you after you explicitly asked them not to, but I don’t see anything unethical about asking. It’s almost never going to work, but shoot your shot I guess.

It reminds me of a situation that happened at OCR in like 2018: a friend of mine was told by a student from another team that the other team was going to pick them so that when they decline, they won’t be able to be picked by a separate alliance, giving the original team’s alliance a better chance. My friend replied with something along the lines of “Why would we say no and let you win? Now we’re going to say yes and we’re both out in two”. Absolute legend.
